>
[Widen Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=4715) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=817" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
<trait label="Spellshape" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=513" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 128 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 138 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You manipulate the energy of your spell, causing it to spread out and affect a wider area. If the next action you use is to Cast a Spell that has an area of a burst, cone, or line and does not have a duration, increase the area of that spell. Add 5 feet to the radius of a burst that normally has a radius of at least 10 feet (a burst with a smaller radius is not affected). Add 5 feet to the length of a cone or line that is normally 15 feet long or smaller, and add 10 feet to the length of a larger cone or line.

<title level="2">Widen Spell leads to...</title>
[Knowledge of Shapes](/Feats.aspx?ID=6061)
name: Widen Spell
